title: FLIGHT 008 | Oblivion is a Crease Left by Memory: Seat 17F
itunes:title: FLIGHT 008 | Oblivion is a Crease Left by Memory: Seat 17F
itunes:subtitle: Technology and art may seem at odds, but in this stunningly beautiful portrait, Nebula-award winning author Chen Qiufan shows us a future made vivid through shared artistic experience.
description:
Technology and art may seem at odds, but in this stunningly beautiful portrait, Nebula-award winning author Chen Qiufan shows us a future made vivid through shared artistic experience. Oblivion is a Crease Left by Memory is written by Chen Qiufan, translated by Ken Liu, and performed by Greg Watanabe.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
